ygData.subject: Re: Fw: [EQMagicians] Just a thought..
ygData.msgSnippet: Just curious, what does it take to summon a pet that makes them expensive at higher levels? Guess you need more than just bone chips, eh? I -knew- it was too
ygData.messageBody:
Just curious, what does it take to summon a pet that makes them expensive at
higher levels? Guess you need more than just bone chips, eh? I -knew- it was
too good to last!


> Its not cost effective at higher levels. Later on your pets
> start costing a
> BUNCH and why run real far away and re summon when you can cast DoT spells
> right there and heal your pet at maximum range? Abandoning your
> pet is only
> useful if you are running, otherwise its just better to stick around and
